thread.title: TABLE-Mexico sets June Maya price for international buyers

title: TABLE-Mexico sets June Maya price for international buyers
text: May 9, 2018 / 5:42 PM / in 11 minutes TABLE-Mexico sets June Maya price for international buyers Reuters Staff 2 Min Read MEXICO CITY, May 9 (Reuters) - Mexican state-owned oil company Pemex revised its June term pricing formulas for crude oil shipped to customers in the Americas, Europe and the Far East, the company said on Wednesday. The following table lists the adjustments to price constants for Pemex's international buyers: DESTINATION MAY CONSTANT JUNE CONSTANT AMERICAS Maya crude -1.50 +0.40 Isthmus crude +3.80 +2.80 Olmeca crude +4.75 +4.40 U.S WEST COAST Maya crude -1.65 +0.25 Isthmus crude +3.80 +2.80 EUROPE Maya crude -5.65 -3.75 Isthmus crude -1.75 -1.75 Olmeca crude -0.50 -1.50 FAR EAST Maya crude -9.20 -8.45 Isthmus crude -1.65 -0.90
